QR Code Reader

Brief: QR Code Reader is an intuitive and efficient app designed to provide quick and precise scanning capabilities for both QR codes and barcodes. This multi-functional tool simplifies the process of decoding various types of codes, turning your mobile device into a powerful scanning utility.
